languages.text: "Великий вопрос — может ли знание быть грешно?" {n}Голос Паскаля металлизируется. Мехадендриты начинают плавно танцевать вокруг его худой фигуры, загадочно извиваясь.{/n} "Миряне успокаивают себя заблуждением, что знание — это просто информация. Что знание не опасно само по себе, опасны лишь дурные его носители".

"Whether knowledge can be profane is the grand question." {n}Pasqal's voice turns metallic. His mechadendrites begin a fluid dance around his lean figure, coiling mysteriously.{/n} "Laypeople find comfort in the delusion that knowledge is merely information. That, in and of itself, it is harmless, and only turns dangerous when it falls into the hands of the wicked."
languages.original_text: "Великий вопрос — может ли знание быть грешно?" {n}Голос Паскаля металлизируется. Мехадендриты начинают плавно танцевать вокруг его худой фигуры, загадочно извиваясь.{/n} "Миряне успокаивают себя заблуждением, что знание — это просто информация. Что знание не опасно само по себе, опасны лишь дурные его носители".

His mechadendrites begin a fluid dance around his lean figure, coiling mysteriously.{/n} "Laypeople find comfort in the delusion that knowledge is merely information. That, in and of itself, it is harmless, and only turns dangerous when it falls into the hands of the wicked."

His mechadendrites begin a fluid dance around his lean figure, coiling mysteriously.{/n} "Laypeople find comfort in the delusion that knowledge is merely information. That, in and of itself, it is harmless, and only turns dangerous when it falls into the hands of the wicked."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “知识本身是否有罪，这是个严肃的问题。”{n}帕斯卡的声音变成了金属声。他的机械触须在他瘦弱的身躯上流畅地跳起了舞，以神秘的动作不断盘绕着。{/n}“普通人的理解存在误区。他们以为知识仅仅是信息而已，以为知识本身是无害的，只有落入邪恶之人的手中才会变得危险。这样的错觉会让他们感到宽慰。”
languages.original_text: "Whether knowledge can be profane is the grand question." {n}Pasqal's voice turns metallic. His mechadendrites begin a fluid dance around his lean figure, coiling mysteriously.{/n} "Laypeople find comfort in the delusion that knowledge is merely information. That, in and of itself, it is harmless, and only turns dangerous when it falls into the hands of the wicked."

traits.locale_text: “知识本身是否有罪，这是个严肃的问题。”{n}帕斯卡的声音变成了金属声。他的机械触须在他瘦弱的身躯上流畅地跳起了舞，以神秘的动作不断盘绕着。{/n}“普通人的理解存在误区。他们以为知识仅仅是信息而已，以为知识本身是无害的，只有落入邪恶之人的手中才会变得危险。这样的错觉会让他们感到宽慰。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «La gran pregunta es si el conocimiento puede ser profano». {n}La voz de Pasqal se vuelve metálica y sus mecadendritas empiezan a bailar en torno a su figura, enroscándose misteriosamente.{/n} «A los laicos en la materia les reconforta la ilusión de que el conocimiento es solo información. Que por sí solo es inocuo, y solo se vuelve peligroso cuando cae en manos de los malvados».
languages.original_text: "Whether knowledge can be profane is the grand question." {n}Pasqal's voice turns metallic. His mechadendrites begin a fluid dance around his lean figure, coiling mysteriously.{/n} "Laypeople find comfort in the delusion that knowledge is merely information. That, in and of itself, it is harmless, and only turns dangerous when it falls into the hands of the wicked."

traits.locale_text: «La gran pregunta es si el conocimiento puede ser pecaminoso». {n}La voz de Pasqal se vuelve metálica y sus mecadendritas empiezan a bailar en torno a su figura, enroscándose misteriosamente.{/n} «A los laicos en la materia les reconforta la ilusión de que el conocimiento es solo información. Que por sí solo es inocuo, y solo se vuelve peligroso cuando cae en manos de los malvados».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「知識が冒涜的になりうるかどうかは、遠大なる問題だ」{n}パスカルの声が金属的な響きを帯びる。彼の機械触手は、その痩せた姿の周りを流れるように踊り始め、神秘的に巻きついている。{/n}「一般人は、知識は単なる情報に過ぎないという妄想に安らぎを見出す。それ自体は無害で、邪悪な者の手に落ちたときだけ危険なものに変わるのだと」
languages.original_text: "Whether knowledge can be profane is the grand question." {n}Pasqal's voice turns metallic. His mechadendrites begin a fluid dance around his lean figure, coiling mysteriously.{/n} "Laypeople find comfort in the delusion that knowledge is merely information. That, in and of itself, it is harmless, and only turns dangerous when it falls into the hands of the wicked."

traits.locale_text: 「知識が冒涜的になりうるかどうかは、遠大なる問題だ」{n}パスカルの声が金属的な響きを帯びる。彼の機械触手は、その痩せた姿の周りを流れるように踊り始め、神秘的に巻きついている。{/n}「一般人は、知識は単なる情報に過ぎないという妄想に安らぎを見出す。それ自体は無害で、邪悪な者の手に落ちたときだけ危険なものに変わるのだと」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Ob Wissen profan sein kann, ist die große Frage." {n}Pasqals Stimme nimmt einen metallischen Klang an. Seine Mechadendriten beginnen einen flüssigen Tanz um seine schlanke Gestalt herum, sie winden sich auf mysteriöse Weise.{/n} "Laien finden Trost in der Illusion, dass Wissen nur aus Informationen besteht. Dass es für sich genommen harmlos ist und nur dann gefährlich wird, wenn es Bösen in die Hände fällt."
languages.original_text: "Whether knowledge can be profane is the grand question." {n}Pasqal's voice turns metallic. His mechadendrites begin a fluid dance around his lean figure, coiling mysteriously.{/n} "Laypeople find comfort in the delusion that knowledge is merely information. That, in and of itself, it is harmless, and only turns dangerous when it falls into the hands of the wicked."

traits.locale_text: "Ob Wissen sündig sein kann, ist die große Frage." {n}Pasqals Stimme nimmt einen metallischen Klang an. Seine Mechadendriten beginnen einen flüssigen Tanz um seine schlanke Gestalt herum, sie winden sich auf mysteriöse Weise.{/n} "Laien finden Trost in der Illusion, dass Wissen nur aus Informationen bestehe. Dass es für sich genommen harmlos sei und nur dann gefährlich werde, wenn es Bösen in die Hände fällt."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « La connaissance peut-elle être profane ? Telle est la question. » {n}La voix de Pasqal prend une sonorité métallique. Ses mécadendrites entament une danse fluide en s'enroulant mystérieusement autour de son corps élancé.{/n} « Pour se réconforter, les profanes aiment à prétendre que la connaissance est purement informative. En soi, il n'y a aucun mal à cela ; le danger se présente uniquement lorsque les profanes en question ont l'esprit malveillant. »
languages.original_text: "Whether knowledge can be profane is the grand question." {n}Pasqal's voice turns metallic. His mechadendrites begin a fluid dance around his lean figure, coiling mysteriously.{/n} "Laypeople find comfort in the delusion that knowledge is merely information. That, in and of itself, it is harmless, and only turns dangerous when it falls into the hands of the wicked."

traits.locale_text: « La connaissance peut-elle être impure ? Telle est la question. » {n}La voix de Pasqal prend une sonorité métallique. Ses mécadendrites entament une danse fluide en s'enroulant mystérieusement autour de son corps élancé.{/n} « Pour se réconforter, les profanes aiment à prétendre que la connaissance est purement informative. En soi, il n'y aucun mal à cela ; le danger se présente uniquement lorsque les profanes en question ont l'esprit malveillant. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "Whether knowledge can be profane is the grand question." {n}Pasqal's voice turns metallic. His mechadendrites begin a fluid dance around his lean figure, coiling mysteriously.{/n} "Laypeople find comfort in the delusion that knowledge is merely information. That, in and of itself, it is harmless, and only turns dangerous when it falls into the hands of the wicked."

languages.text: "İrfanın din dışı olup olamayacağı yüce bir sorudur." {n}Pasqal'ın sesi metalikleşiyor. Mekadentritleri, cılız bedeninin etrafında akıcı bir dansa başlayıp gizemli helezonlar oluşturuyor.{/n} "Ayaktakımı, irfanın yalnızca bilgi olduğu sanrısında avuntu bulur. Bu, kendi başına ele alındığında zararsız olup kötü niyetli kişilerin eline geçtiğinde yalnızca tehlikeli bir hâl alır."
languages.original_text: "Whether knowledge can be profane is the grand question." {n}Pasqal's voice turns metallic. His mechadendrites begin a fluid dance around his lean figure, coiling mysteriously.{/n} "Laypeople find comfort in the delusion that knowledge is merely information. That, in and of itself, it is harmless, and only turns dangerous when it falls into the hands of the wicked."

traits.locale_text: "İrfanın din dışı olup olamayacağı yüce bir sorudur." {n}Pasqal'ın sesi metalik bir hâl alıyor. Mekadentritleri, cılız bedeninin etrafında akıcı bir dansa başlıyor ve gizemli helezonlar oluşturuyor.{/n} "Ayaktakımı, irfanın yalnızca bilgi olduğu sanrısında avuntu bulur. Bu, kendi başına ele alındığında zararsızdır ve yalnızca kötü niyetli kişilerin eline geçtiğinde tehlikeli bir hâl alır."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
